comments.body: `withDefaultValue` returns a inner class extending `mutable.Map`. So, we should use `Map` for `aggregate`.

I think you can import mutable, and use `mutable.Map[String,Int]` instead of this type def, but, it's fine either way.
Looks like the only instance of this, so go ahead.
Side comment: generally speaking Seq types have less weird generic type problems than Arrays. This is a good example
